name: Denzil Rivaldo Amalraj
title: Mechanical Engineer | CAD & FEA Engineer
tagline: Designing manufacturable automotive tooling and validating performance through simulation-driven engineering.

sections.about: Graduate Mechanical Engineering student with industry experience in automotive BIW fixtures, GD&T-driven documentation, and PLM-controlled release workflows. I build production-ready designs with a focus on accuracy, manufacturability, and repeatable standards and I use FEA to validate critical components when performance margins matter.
